title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4041.2 - Permission required to run horse in deviate colors
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4041.2 - Permission required to run horse in deviate colors

State Regulations

No person shall run a horse in colors other than those
registered in his or her own or a stable name without special permission of the
stewards. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4041.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
